mapper.select: select f.position_id as positionId, p.position_name as positionName, p.position_salary as positionSalary, c.id as companyId, c.company_name as companyName, f.is_send as isSend, f.create_time as createDate from findjob f ,company c,position p where f.user_id=#{userId} and f.position_id = p.id and p.company_id = c.id order by f.create_time
